特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
【合併】Introduction to The World of English（総合政策学部）/英語文化論　２（総合政策学部）
授業方法:
The lecture will be a combination of listening, reading, and answering questions on LUNA.
Students who are permitted to take the course online will be provided with the materials through LUNA.

第1回: How many words do you need to know?
第2回: In the beginning: A brief history of the capital letter
第4回: Like, the word like is like, awesome
第8回: Around and around they go: Those shifty vowels
第11回: Practice makes perfect: Frequency and the phrase
第13回: Heavy words: The weight of a clause
トピック.授業計画1: All 14 classes will be taught face to face.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students will be required to learn and remember the new vocabulary. They will be tested on their ability to remember and use the vocabulary.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.

name: 【100】英語文化論　２／Introduction to The World of English
担当者: ヘファナン　ケビン（HEFFERNAN KEVIN MICHAEL）
